org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity

Interface ImpurityComputer<T,H extends Histogram<T,H>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Base object type for histogram.
    H - Type of histogram that can be used in math operations with this object.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Histogram<T,H>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiniHistogram, MSEHistogram

    public interface ImpurityComputer<T,H extends Histogram<T,H>>
extends Histogram<T,H>
    Interface represents an object that can compute best splitting point using features histograms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<NodeSplit> findBestSplit()
      Returns best split point computed on histogram if it exists.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.ignite.ml.dataset.feature.Histogram

        addElement, buckets, getValue, isEqualTo, plus

    • Method Detail

      • findBestSplit

        Optional<NodeSplit> findBestSplit()
        Returns best split point computed on histogram if it exists. Split point may be absent when there is no data in histograms or split point lay in last bucket in histogram.
        Returns:
        Splitting point for decision tree.
